title: China Alpine Resort in Changbaishan Mountains with Indoor Pool & Day Spa
description:
Retreat to the forested slopes of Changbai Mountain with a stay at this stylish alpine resort set within a UNESCO-listed biosphere reserve. After days spent hiking lush trails or skiing pristine runs, unwind in the hotelâ€™s scenic hot springs, lounge by the indoor pool or book a rejuvenating treatment at Shui Liao, the tranquil onsite spa.

Dining is a highlight here, with four diverse venues to indulge in. Enjoy barbecue tabletop cooking at Chalet BBQ, cocktails with light bites until late at Yes Bar, hearty all-day dining at Market Cafe or Asian street food at Changbai House - perfect for refuelling after a day in the great outdoors.
offer_address: Changbaishan International Resort, Baishan, Jilin 134504, China
